Text.Page:
Our resident arachnen expert, Animan, is missing. He's a fearless little researcher, so I can imagine him getting in over his head.

I need you to venture into the upper levels east of here and find him. Help him if he needs it.

And I wouldn't mind knowing he's all right, either.

Aah!

Sorry! Thought you were an arachnen. Very scary. Turns out, nature drinks blood. I'm better now.
